attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My phone company has upped prices by 35%.
My mobile phone company by 30%
My petrol this month 6% (> 80% a year)
My utilities by 25%
Food - beyond calculation
My wages - 2%
Inflation - 2%

Come this is WRONG some of this stuff IS controllable by government and you MUST do more.
